name: Terry Roof
text: We went in for the pizza buffet at lunchtime.  We were pushed for time and wanted something good and quick, thinking that a buffet was quickest for lunch. Well for starters we waited almost 10 minutes to get seated. There was only 1 table …More

name: charan Pal Singh
text: Out of the menu, garlic bread, pizza and chicken wings I particularly liked chicken wings lavishly dipped into buffalo sauce. Garlic bread and pizza was just ok. Sitting area is poorly maintained and cleaning is not appropriate. Washrooms …More

name: Ed Bragg
text: As always Pizza Hut delivers great pizza and wings. I was saddened to find out that they don't offer the bottomless picture of soda anymore, or ever at this location. The dine-in seating area is a bit dated. We did have an early dinner but …More

name: rey mireles
text: Came in on 24 Mar for lunch, the dining area was very well kept, three other families were also dining. The server/host made our first time experience here a negative one. His appearance was gross and that's being nice, his clothes and his …More

name: Jeong Wook Son
text: I will never visit here again. The service was slow and the guy taking my order was very socially inept. You are better off at Little Ceasars but don't bring a bill larger than $20.

name: Allen Terwilliger
text: Too bad this location is being demolished to make way for an ( ice cream shop?)

name: Jonathan Apgar
text: Waiter was unpleasant. Many tables unclean and not bused. Floor was dirty. Men's room disgusting. Worst Pizza Hut I have ever experienced.

name: Kyle Gavin
text: It's Pizza Hut, so you sort of know what to expect regarding the pizza itself.  This location, typically, they deliver quickly and it's usually hot, but occasionally, it takes longer to deliver than to actually make the food. …More

name: Mark Johnston
text: I will not order from here again. Read a few reviews and though I give them the  benefit of the doubt because I really like Pizza Hut. Turns out I should have listen to them. This has to be the worse one ever. I placed my order a little …More

name: B Lys
text: Don't ever recommend eating in here. They dont know how to run the dining area, more of just a take out place honestly. The delivery boy was cashier one day and refused to give me my pizza and breadsticks till I gave him my number. Most …More

name: Tom Bennett
text: pizza hut in Warrenton needs gluten free pizza three other places do but we only do carryout because my wife needs gluten free

name: Kelly Roukas
text: I would not recommend this restaurant to anyone. All the tables were dirty and some still had piles of dirty dishes. There was hair in our food, and not just one! The restrooms were disgusting.

name: Dennis W. White
text: Good food and good setvice...

name: Mike Harvey
text: The food was delicious. The server was Excellent.  The bathroom door opened out of the bathroom.

name: hp pie
text: Staff is super sweet but the food is subpar and the restaurant is very dirty. Seriously, clean up the place and serve better food. I like the new management but hope they turn it around soon. Luckily, Warrenton doesn't have a health inspector or you would be closed.

name: E C
text: They skip out on the toppings in order to cook the pizza faster, but that results in half-cooked overtly greasy crust that upsets your stomach.  Other locations do like double the toppings.  They're basically stealing from the public.

name: Rory Mayberry
text: Good pizza slow service

name: Mia Speach
text: They charged my account twice and the Manager gave me my refund plus a free pizza. They deliver quick and pizza is always hot. Good place to eat when you want something quick.

name: Andre Guadarrama
text: I feel like it use to be better when I was a kid!

name: Pearl Bruck
text: Went in to order one pizza to go. There was only one or two employees there, I think. Very sparse. The gentleman who showed up to take my order was not very happy or pleasant. When I came back to pick up my pizza no one was around. There …More

name: Lee Richerson
text: The food and service were very good. Came in during the lunch buffet. I would recommend as a change of pace to other food places.

name: Dave Hawn
text: At one time they were good but,  the last time I was there..... I don't know what happen but, no sweet tea, salad was dry and old, only 2 salad dressing to choose from. The service needs help in costume service. There was a atmosphere of I don't give a sh......

name: michael shaw
text: Prices were ideal, pizza came out exactly how it was order and tasted great, took a little longer than expected to cook the pizza but in the end everything was eaten and looked fantastic

name: Nicole R
text: My boyfriend and I dined in tonight. We had a young man named Francis (i think) who was wonderful! He took his job with pride and I enjoyed every minute we were there. We were running short on time and he was so helpful to help us enjoy our …More

name: Jennifer Arellano
text: Upon the kids request we went to Pizza Hut. We were turned away because they didn’t have any wait staff, they told us carry out only at 4:30 on a Thursday afternoon. We decided eat somewhere else, they lost our $100 order to a competitor.

name: Deborah Mclucas
text: Love this Pizza Hut dine in or carry out it's the best. The customer service is very satisfying and The pizza is always prepared and cooked just right. Today I tryed the mild bone in wings and they were soooooi good and I was surprised on …More

name: polly bryant
text: Sometimes this Pizza hut is the best then you get a raw dough from them

name: Hannah Dowd
text: Pizza was cold, dry, and undercook. Overly expensive buffet if eating in. Dinning wear was disgusting, covered in cracks, mildew, and just looked unwashed. Food is often left out for too long. And kitchen is just a mess, including hair in some of the food.

name: Nellie Avila
text: Pan pizza is good, the service can use improvement.

name: Matthew Taylor
text: I placed an on line order for a veggie lovers and cheese lovers with marinara sauce.  I got a cheese lovers with cream sauce.  I complained and got a free pizza.  Later I ordered a veggie, cheese and 18 wings.  I used my name to order.  My …More

name: Robbie Rounds Jr
text: Service is hit and miss. Food is usually good and accurate. Should close down the drive thru, most of the time it is not answered

name: John Anderson
text: If I could give zero stars I would. Ordered for delivery via the app and received a call 30 minutes later with a message that the delivery driver had left for the evening. Called back and spoke with the "manager" and pointed out that if …More

text: Service is improving lately and the pizza is the best.

text: They mess up the order and the server was an idiot.

name: Pablo Portillo
text: Horrible service, we even had to seat ourselves. Waiter had an attitude like he didn't care, we had to get up and refill our drinks because he never came to check. Pizza was not the best, the only thing I liked was that it was stuffed crust.

name: Rising Sun
text: Takes a long time to be seated, and get your food not worth the wait

name: Brian Lachniet
text: This location meets my normal expectations of a Pizza Hut. The staff is about what you would expect - not rude, but not going out of their way to be extra friendly either. The food tastes just like any other Pizza Hut, as expected.

text: Very rude manager! Nasty when answering the phone not very good customer service! Eat here all the time, now dealing with this nasty manager and customer service I will be recommending locals to papa johns!

text: The claims of new management and staff are true but the attitude is still the same piss poor Attitudes by all employees and the food is average nothing's changed at this pizzaslut
